cards.title: Jumpa Payment Security
cards.text: All payments you make on Jumpa are protected by a personal payment passcode you set during onboarding. You also have your seed phrase.

cards.title: Jumpa Wallet
cards.text: Jumpa is a non custodial wallet

header.title: Frequently Asked Question
header.subtitle: Here are some of the most common inquiries we receive to help you make informed decisions with confidence. If you need more details, feel free to reach out!

faqs.q: What crypto currencies does Jumpa support
faqs.a: Jumpa supports a wide range of blockchains and networks, including Optimism, Ethereum, Solana, Binance Smart Chain, Tron, Polygon, Arbitrum, Base, Celo, and Lisk

Yes. Jumpa is built with security at its core, using end-to-end encryption, secure authentication, and industry-standard protocols to protect your data and transactions. Everything you share on Jumpa remains private and securely handled.

faqs.q: What if I loose my phone
faqs.a: First, you can export your contract address to any other mobile device, and you also have your recovery PIN, which you can change through your email to recover back your wallet.

faqs.q: How do I start using Jumpa?
faqs.a: Getting started is simple. Tap ‘Jump in’ to open a chat with Jumpa on Telegram. You’ll go through a quick setup to create your account, and once that’s complete, you’ll be ready to start trading on Jumpa.

faqs.q: What local currencies are available on Jumpa?
faqs.a: Jumpa currently supports Naira (NGN), Ghana Cedis (GHS),  We’re working on adding more local currencies soon
